abstract: Clinical trials for the drug, Invokana, showed that it improved patients’ blood-sugar levels and also led to weight loss and reductions in blood pressure.
snippet: Clinical trials for the drug, Invokana, showed that it improved patients’ blood-sugar levels and also led to weight loss and reductions in blood pressure.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration on Friday approved the first of a new class of medicines to treat diabetes.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves a New Diabetes Drug From J.&J.
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves a New Diabetes Drug From J.&J.

byline.original: By Katie Thomas and Andrew Pollack
